description.value: You can connect with cave worms (and other worm-related creatures, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Make an Impression] on cave worms and to make simple Requests of them. In most cases, the cave worm's starting attitude is indifferent and they will give you time to establish contact.

publication.title: Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm
